name: MILITARY
description:
MILITARY is a free to play realistic first-person military shooter. Players can show their skills and strategies using a huge selection of game maps and models and weapons. Join players around the world in one of the most modern games on Steam!

Game features

More than 85+ weapons: SMG, guns, sniper, rifles, pistols, LMG, and some others weapons!
20 maps
10 characters for collection
400+ personalization skins

MILITARY is a free to play game. Almost any item can be obtained simply during the game. Defeat the enemy alone or together with friends, in both conventional and TDM modes.
